subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A three-way deal would send Roy Halladay to Philadelphia, Cliff Lee to Seattle, and prospects to Toronto. Meanwhile, Boston was close to a five-year contract with John Lackey.
snippet: A three-way deal would send Roy Halladay to Philadelphia, Cliff Lee to Seattle, and prospects to Toronto. Meanwhile, Boston was close to a five-year contract with John Lackey.
